markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Known Set Relics](/Rules.aspx?ID=1975)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Several set relics are known to exist. You can adjust them with items tailored to your players' characters or create custom sets, using the benefits described here as a guideline. Set relics in this section use aspects found in this book or the _Gamemastery Guide_.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Known Set Relics
search_markdown:

text: Known Set Relics Source Treasure Vault pg. 201 1.1 Several set relics are known to exist. Set relics in this section use aspects found in this book or the Gamemastery Guide .
